docs.snippet: A video shows at least four unarmed men being gunned down in the water. Despite dozens of witnesses, the killings went unreported and remain a mystery....
docs.lead_paragraph: A video shows at least four unarmed men being gunned down in the water. Despite dozens of witnesses, the killings went unreported and remain a mystery.
docs.abstract: Video footage of four men being gunned down near overturned boat reveals shocking level of lawlessness at sea; murder has gone uninvestigated, despite presence of dozens of witnesses, due to vagaries of maritime law; rise of piracy has led to ubiquity of weapons and armed guards at sea, allowing fatal score-settling, summary execution, vigilantism and other forms of violence to occur under the guise of defense (Series: The Outlaw Ocean).

headline.main: Murder at Sea: Captured on Video, but Killers Go Free
headline.print_headline: Video Captures 4 Murders, but Killers Go Unpunished

docs.snippet: The children each received a doll and a sword. Then they were lined up, more than 120 of them, and given their next lesson by their Islamic State group instructors: Behead the doll....
docs.lead_paragraph: The children each received a doll and a sword. Then they were lined up, more than 120 of them, and given their next lesson by their Islamic State group instructors: Behead the doll.

headline.main: In an IS Training Camp, Children Told: Behead the Doll
headline.print_headline: In an IS Training Camp, Children Told: Behead the Doll

docs.snippet: A year after the war started in southeastern Ukraine, the Russian military has largely abandoned efforts to disguise its activities along the border....
docs.lead_paragraph: A year after the war started in southeastern Ukraine, the Russian military has largely abandoned efforts to disguise its activities along the border.
docs.abstract: Tiny village of Golovinka in Russia's historically pastoral steppe region has been greatly affected by intense military activity surrounding nearby Kuzminka military base in midst of Ukraine conflict; Ukrainian and Western governments claim Kuzminka is staging ground for Russian soldiers and weapons headed into the war zone in southeastern Ukraine.

headline.main: Russian Town Near Ukraine, Once Quiet, Now Buzzes With Military Activity
headline.print_headline: A Once Quiet Russian Town Buzzes With Military Activity
